title: The Collected Works of Quinton Veal
description: Quinton Veal has combined his first two books into a delicious, erotic menu of art, poems and fiction for adults only. In this volume, there is art to tease the eye, and stories and poetry to satisfy the body. The Collected Works of Quinton Veal is truly a sensuous feast for lovers, young and old. -Valjeanne Jeffers, author of The Immortal and The Switch Series
author: Quinton Veal
